name: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk FPS
description:
In Twilight Town: A Cyperpunk FPS, you can play as either Ikuro or the Girl as you follow a funny yet engrossing storyline about giving Ikuro's AI wife, known as Sei, a real body in this first person shooter game.

FEATURES


Advanced gore system: Realistic blood textures and enemy limbs will keep you engaged in the combat, the enemy limbs will always land randomly to ensure no 2 kills feel quite the same

Engaging, varied combat: Get up close and personal with a shotgun, shred them with a submachine gun, pick them off with a carbine or blow them to bits with explosives, coupled with a unique headshot system, boss fights and enemy variety, the combat will always manage to stay fresh to the end

Stop Time & Parry: Use the game's unique parry mechanic to deflect enemy attacks back at them, furthermore, you can also stop time and unleash hell upon your foes
